00001 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00002 ! Subroutine : PostCollisionG
00003 ! Revision   : 1.0 (2008-06-15)

00034 
00035  SUBROUTINE PostCollisionG
00036 
00037 ! Common Variables
00038  USE Domain,      ONLY : nxt, xl, xlg, xsize6, xu, xug, yl, ylg, ysize6, yu, yug
00039  USE FluidParams, ONLY : p, u
00040  USE LBMParams,   ONLY : g
00041  USE MPIParams
00042  USE MPI
00043  IMPLICIT NONE
00044 
00045 ! Local Variables
00046  INTEGER :: count, i, j
00047  INTEGER :: MPI_ERR, MPI_REQ
00048  INTEGER :: status(MPI_STATUS_SIZE)
00049 
00050 
00051 !-------- Save data for outward g components from the ghost nodes and ----------
00052 !-------- velocity and pressure from the real nodes at the boundaries ----------
00053 ! X DIRECTION
00054  count = 1
00055  DO j = yl, yu
00056    hydro_west_snd(count)     = g(xlg,j,3,nxt)
00057    hydro_west_snd(count + 1) = g(xlg,j,6,nxt)
00058    hydro_west_snd(count + 2) = g(xlg,j,7,nxt)
00059    hydro_west_snd(count + 3) = u(xl,j,1)
00060    hydro_west_snd(count + 4) = u(xl,j,2)
00061    hydro_west_snd(count + 5) = p(xl,j)
00062 
00063    hydro_east_snd(count)     = g(xug,j,1,nxt)
00064    hydro_east_snd(count + 1) = g(xug,j,5,nxt)
00065    hydro_east_snd(count + 2) = g(xug,j,8,nxt)
00066    hydro_east_snd(count + 3) = u(xu,j,1)
00067    hydro_east_snd(count + 4) = u(xu,j,2)
00068    hydro_east_snd(count + 5) = p(xu,j)
00069    count = count + 6
00070  END DO
00071 
00072 ! Y DIRECTION
00073  count = 1
00074  DO i = xl, xu
00075    hydro_south_snd(count)     = g(i,ylg,4,nxt)
00076    hydro_south_snd(count + 1) = g(i,ylg,7,nxt)
00077    hydro_south_snd(count + 2) = g(i,ylg,8,nxt)
00078    hydro_south_snd(count + 3) = u(i,yl,1)
00079    hydro_south_snd(count + 4) = u(i,yl,2)
00080    hydro_south_snd(count + 5) = p(i,yl)
00081 
00082    hydro_north_snd(count)     = g(i,yug,2,nxt)
00083    hydro_north_snd(count + 1) = g(i,yug,5,nxt)
00084    hydro_north_snd(count + 2) = g(i,yug,6,nxt)
00085    hydro_north_snd(count + 3) = u(i,yu,1)
00086    hydro_north_snd(count + 4) = u(i,yu,2)
00087    hydro_north_snd(count + 5) = p(i,yu)
00088    count = count + 6
00089  END DO
00090 
00091 ! NORTH-EAST DIAGONAL
00092  hydro_ne_snd(1) = g(xug,yug,5,nxt)
00093  hydro_ne_snd(2) = u(xu,yu,1)
00094  hydro_ne_snd(3) = u(xu,yu,2)
00095  hydro_ne_snd(4) = p(xu,yu)
00096 
00097 ! NORTH-WEST DIAGONAL
00098  hydro_nw_snd(1) = g(xlg,yug,6,nxt)
00099  hydro_nw_snd(2) = u(xl,yu,1)
00100  hydro_nw_snd(3) = u(xl,yu,2)
00101  hydro_nw_snd(4) = p(xl,yu)
00102 
00103 ! SOUTH-WEST DIAGONAL
00104  hydro_sw_snd(1) = g(xlg,ylg,7,nxt)
00105  hydro_sw_snd(2) = u(xl,yl,1)
00106  hydro_sw_snd(3) = u(xl,yl,2)
00107  hydro_sw_snd(4) = p(xl,yl)
00108 
00109 ! SOUTH-EAST DIAGONAL
00110  hydro_se_snd(1) = g(xug,ylg,8,nxt)
00111  hydro_se_snd(2) = u(xu,yl,1)
00112  hydro_se_snd(3) = u(xu,yl,2)
00113  hydro_se_snd(4) = p(xu,yl)
00114 
00115 !-------- Exchange information using MPI calls ---------------------------------
00116 ! X DIRECTION
00117  CALL MPI_IRECV(hydro_east_rcv, xsize6, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, east, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00118  CALL MPI_SEND( hydro_west_snd, xsize6, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, west, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00119  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00120 
00121  CALL MPI_IRECV(hydro_west_rcv, xsize6, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, west, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00122  CALL MPI_SEND( hydro_east_snd, xsize6, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, east, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00123  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00124 
00125 ! Y DIRECTION
00126  CALL MPI_IRECV(hydro_north_rcv, ysize6, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, north, TAG3, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00127  CALL MPI_SEND( hydro_south_snd, ysize6, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, south, TAG3, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00128  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00129 
00130  CALL MPI_IRECV(hydro_south_rcv, ysize6, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, south, TAG4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00131  CALL MPI_SEND( hydro_north_snd, ysize6, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, north, TAG4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00132  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00133 
00134 ! DIAGONALS
00135  CALL MPI_IRECV(hydro_ne_rcv, 4, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, ne, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00136  CALL MPI_SEND( hydro_sw_snd, 4, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, sw, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00137  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00138 
00139  CALL MPI_IRECV(hydro_nw_rcv, 4, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, nw, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00140  CALL MPI_SEND( hydro_se_snd, 4, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, se, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00141  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00142 
00143  CALL MPI_IRECV(hydro_se_rcv, 4, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, se, TAG3, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00144  CALL MPI_SEND( hydro_nw_snd, 4, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, nw, TAG3, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00145  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00146 
00147  CALL MPI_IRECV(hydro_sw_rcv, 4, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, sw, TAG4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00148  CALL MPI_SEND( hydro_ne_snd, 4, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, ne, TAG4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00149  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00150 
00151 !-------- Update inward components of g in the real nodes at the boundaries ----
00152 !-------- and velocity and pressure at the ghost nodes                      ----
00153 ! X DIRECTION
00154  count = 1
00155  DO j = yl, yu
00156    g(xu,j,3,nxt) = hydro_east_rcv(count)
00157    g(xu,j,6,nxt) = hydro_east_rcv(count + 1)
00158    g(xu,j,7,nxt) = hydro_east_rcv(count + 2)
00159    u(xug,j,1)    = hydro_east_rcv(count + 3)
00160    u(xug,j,2)    = hydro_east_rcv(count + 4)
00161    p(xug,j)      = hydro_east_rcv(count + 5)
00162 
00163    g(xl,j,1,nxt) = hydro_west_rcv(count)
00164    g(xl,j,5,nxt) = hydro_west_rcv(count + 1)
00165    g(xl,j,8,nxt) = hydro_west_rcv(count + 2)
00166    u(xlg,j,1)    = hydro_west_rcv(count + 3)
00167    u(xlg,j,2)    = hydro_west_rcv(count + 4)
00168    p(xlg,j)      = hydro_west_rcv(count + 5)
00169    count = count + 6
00170  END DO
00171 
00172 ! Y DIRECTION
00173  count = 1
00174  DO i = xl, xu
00175    g(i,yu,4,nxt) = hydro_north_rcv(count)
00176    g(i,yu,7,nxt) = hydro_north_rcv(count + 1)
00177    g(i,yu,8,nxt) = hydro_north_rcv(count + 2)
00178    u(i,yug,1)    = hydro_north_rcv(count + 3)
00179    u(i,yug,2)    = hydro_north_rcv(count + 4)
00180    p(i,yug)      = hydro_north_rcv(count + 5)
00181 
00182    g(i,yl,2,nxt) = hydro_south_rcv(count)
00183    g(i,yl,5,nxt) = hydro_south_rcv(count + 1)
00184    g(i,yl,6,nxt) = hydro_south_rcv(count + 2)
00185    u(i,ylg,1)    = hydro_south_rcv(count + 3)
00186    u(i,ylg,2)    = hydro_south_rcv(count + 4)
00187    p(i,ylg)      = hydro_south_rcv(count + 5)
00188    count = count + 6
00189  END DO
00190 
00191 ! NORTH-EAST DIAGONAL
00192  g(xu,yu,7,nxt) = hydro_ne_rcv(1)
00193  u(xug,yug,1)   = hydro_ne_rcv(2)
00194  u(xug,yug,2)   = hydro_ne_rcv(3)
00195  p(xug,yug)     = hydro_ne_rcv(4)
00196 
00197 ! NORTH-WEST DIAGONAL
00198  g(xl,yu,8,nxt) = hydro_nw_rcv(1)
00199  u(xlg,yug,1)   = hydro_nw_rcv(2)
00200  u(xlg,yug,2)   = hydro_nw_rcv(3)
00201  p(xlg,yug)     = hydro_nw_rcv(4)
00202 
00203 ! SOUTH-WEST DIAGONAL
00204  g(xl,yl,5,nxt) = hydro_sw_rcv(1)
00205  u(xlg,ylg,1)   = hydro_sw_rcv(2)
00206  u(xlg,ylg,2)   = hydro_sw_rcv(3)
00207  p(xlg,ylg)     = hydro_sw_rcv(4)
00208 
00209 ! SOUTH-EAST DIAGONAL
00210  g(xu,yl,6,nxt) = hydro_se_rcv(1)
00211  u(xug,ylg,1)   = hydro_se_rcv(2)
00212  u(xug,ylg,2)   = hydro_se_rcv(3)
00213  p(xug,ylg)     = hydro_se_rcv(4)
00214 
00215 
00216  RETURN
00217  END SUBROUTINE PostCollisionG
00218
